title: polymerbit
author: polymerbit
content: To commemorate fifteen years of Bitcoin...I'm happy to announce that today all shareholders agreed to drop all other cryptocurrency projects under the Polymerbit brand name. In practice this means we sold rights to a third party. Bitcoin exclusive Polymerbits from now on.

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Thank you for doing this. Now I am interested in purchasing your products. Bitcoin is the only decentralized coin and the only chance we have at separating money and state. Time and capital invested in other centralized products is a waste for humanity.Shitcoins don't stand a chance against the king: Bitcoin.Satoshi really blessed us. Satoshi is the 2nd coming of Christ. Few understand. Bitcoin is divine intervention.

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: If I understand that right, that would mean there could be e.g. new ETH Polymerbit notes, including your logo, just not made by you..?Or am I missing something...Quote from: polymerbit on October 31, 2023, 06:29:25 PMIn practice this means we sold rights to a third party. Bitcoin exclusive Polymerbits from now on.

comments.author: polymerbit
comments.body: Quote from: tldr-hodl on October 31, 2023, 06:50:52 PMIf I understand that right, that would mean there could be e.g. new ETH Polymerbit notes, including your logo, just not made by you..?Or am I missing something...Quote from: polymerbit on October 31, 2023, 06:29:25 PMIn practice this means we sold rights to a third party. Bitcoin exclusive Polymerbits from now on. No, what it means is we provide the know how and assistance to produce other wallets. But they will never be under the Polymerbit name again. The brand is finally focused on BTC. All the newest tech will always first be in a Poly btc note.
